data.name: MechaNest
data.detailed_description:
In this scifi third person action-adventure game u are a Protector taking the control over MechaNest back.
Find your way true mazes, farm Mechaparts, craft keys and weapons, vehicles and upgrades.
Unlock and use the special transportation tubes across the world.
Earn reputation with the Mecha citizens so that we can find the balance again between the Mechs and Humans.
data.about_the_game:
In this scifi third person action-adventure game u are a Protector taking the control over MechaNest back.
Find your way true mazes, farm Mechaparts, craft keys and weapons, vehicles and upgrades.
Unlock and use the special transportation tubes across the world.
Earn reputation with the Mecha citizens so that we can find the balance again between the Mechs and Humans.
data.short_description: Explore Scifi third person action-adventure game MechaNest. City on the planet Merador where the citizens are overthrown by Ai and Mecha's. But be careful MechaNest is full with traps, mazes and vicious Mechanics.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
